main event: A round, luminous, bluish-white object was observed moving up and down while following a definite flight path.
interesting points: The object moved up and down but followed a definite trail, drifting up and down before going off at a slight angle.
The total sighting time was 6 to 8 minutes.
The report suggests the observation was probably a reflection, as the irregular movements indicate it was likely a reflection from an aircraft or car headlights.
Several civilian witnesses reported the sighting from different locations around Pikesville, Maryland.
The weather conditions included an inversion layer, which may have contributed to the reflection-like behavior of the observed object.
result: Likely a reflection, investigation arranged but observation lost before light
photographs: yes, but not present in the image
